Martin. The brutal open-world RPG quickly became a favorite for fans of the developer‚Äôs Dark Souls franchise due to its massive boss fights and unforgiving combat. Elden Rin...

item.description: Image: Larian Studios via Polygon Official release could still be ‚Äòseveral months away,‚Äô however After a recent Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3 hotfix broke a lot of mods, including a popular tool, Larian Studios a...
item.content:encoded: Image: Larian Studios via Polygon Official release could still be ‚Äòseveral months away,‚Äô however After a recent Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3 hotfix broke a lot of mods, including a popular tool, Larian Studios announced that it‚Äôs working on official mod support. Larian‚Äôs director of publishing Michael Douse took to X (formerly Twitter) to address some concerns from the modding community, stating that the team was working on cross-platform mod support. The update is expected to be released later this year. ...

item.title: Pacific Drive packs up survival games and takes them on the road | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Ironwood Studios/Kepler Interactive Like its car, Ironwood Studios‚Äô debut is a cranky, valiant mongrel Having already played a preview build of Pacific Drive, I felt confident going into my p...
item.content:encoded: Image: Ironwood Studios/Kepler Interactive Like its car, Ironwood Studios‚Äô debut is a cranky, valiant mongrel Having already played a preview build of Pacific Drive, I felt confident going into my playthrough for this review. I‚Äôd learned a lot about this ornery but captivating driving/survival/roguelite game in those few hours ‚Äî knowledge I thought I could apply from the get-go. I thought I could just start optimizing my resource collection and applying my understanding of some of its arcane s...

item.title: The Halo TV series unceremoniously killed one of the games‚Äô best characters | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Adrienn Szabo/Paramount+ RIP to [redacted], you deserved more than this show could ever give you The Halo TV show has always held the video game series‚Äô lore at arm‚Äôs length. From its early a...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Adrienn Szabo/Paramount+ RIP to [redacted], you deserved more than this show could ever give you The Halo TV show has always held the video game series‚Äô lore at arm‚Äôs length. From its early announcement of the ‚ÄúSilver Timeline‚Äù (an entirely separate but loosely similar canon that the TV show would be sticking to) to the first season, which gives Master Chief a slightly different origin story, the Paramount Plus series has never been concerned with the things longtime Halo fans hold near...

item.description: Posted by Long Zhao, Senior Research Scientist, and Ting Liu, Senior Staff Software Engineer, Google Research An astounding number of videos are available on the Web, covering a variety of content...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Long Zhao, Senior Research Scientist, and Ting Liu, Senior Staff Software Engineer, Google Research An astounding number of videos are available on the Web, covering a variety of content from everyday moments people share to historical moments to scientific observations, each of which contains a unique record of the world. The right tools could help researchers analyze these videos, transforming how we understand the world around us. Videos offer dynamic visual content far more r...

item.description: Image: David Benzal/Modiphius Entertainment Muad‚Äôdib will rise in Modiphius‚Äô new expansion for the hit TTRPG Most tabletop role-playing games place their epic storylines more or less entirely in the...
item.content:encoded: Image: David Benzal/Modiphius Entertainment Muad‚Äôdib will rise in Modiphius‚Äô new expansion for the hit TTRPG Most tabletop role-playing games place their epic storylines more or less entirely in the hands of the players at the table. Their choices open up a myriad of opportunities and branching paths for their own private games, each presenting a unique experience that changes at every turn. Dune: Fall of the Imperium takes a different approach. Just as in Frank Herbert‚Äôs novels ‚Äî and in Denis...

item.title: We finally know Project L‚Äôs full name, and it‚Äôs 2XKO | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Riot Games Riot‚Äôs fighting game‚Äôs final name is fully revealed The full name of the upcoming League of Legends fighting game has been revealed, and it‚Äôs 2XKO. Riot Games unveiled the game‚Äôs n...
item.content:encoded: Image: Riot Games Riot‚Äôs fighting game‚Äôs final name is fully revealed The full name of the upcoming League of Legends fighting game has been revealed, and it‚Äôs 2XKO. Riot Games unveiled the game‚Äôs new identity on social media on Thursday, alongside new social channels on X, formerly known as Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook. Executive producer Tom Cannon teased the reveal in a tweet on Wednesday, sharing that this is ‚Äúthe last Project L update, because we‚Äôre announcing our actual name ...

item.title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth swamps its exhilarating tribute in open-world bloat | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Square Enix It‚Äôs worth your time, but maybe not as much as it asks for I had over two weeks to play Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, and I spent most of the last seven days asking myself: Do I say th...
item.content:encoded: Image: Square Enix It‚Äôs worth your time, but maybe not as much as it asks for I had over two weeks to play Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, and I spent most of the last seven days asking myself: Do I say that I loved this game, or that I hated it? It‚Äôs time to put pen to paper and the truth is, I still haven‚Äôt decided. I did love this game; I did hate this game. My waking hours not spent on my day job ‚Äî over 90 such hours, by the time I saw credits ‚Äî were nothing but this game. ‚ÄúA Lot‚Äù is a reductive ...

item.content:encoded: Posted by Zheng Xu, Research Scientist, and Yanxiang Zhang, Software Engineer, Google Language models (LMs) trained to predict the next word given input text are the key technology for many applications [1, 2]. In Gboard, LMs are used to improve users‚Äô typing experience by supporting features like next word prediction (NWP), Smart Compose, smart completion and suggestion, slide to type, and proofread. Deploying models on users‚Äô devices rather than enterprise servers has advantages like lower...

item.title: Prompt Engineering: An Integrated Dream | KDnuggets
item.description: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just ano...
item.content:encoded: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just another internet pipe dream? Let's ditch the sensationalism and delve into the actual job market data to find out.

item.title: Learning the importance of training data under concept drift | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Nishant Jain, Pre-doctoral Researcher, and Pradeep Shenoy, Research Scientist, Google Research The constantly changing nature of the world around us poses a significant challenge for the...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Nishant Jain, Pre-doctoral Researcher, and Pradeep Shenoy, Research Scientist, Google Research The constantly changing nature of the world around us poses a significant challenge for the development of AI models. Often, models are trained on longitudinal data with the hope that the training data used will accurately represent inputs the model may receive in the future. More generally, the default assumption that all training data are equally relevant often breaks in practice. For e...

item.title: Semantic Layers are the Missing Piece for AI-Enabled Analytics | KDnuggets
item.description: Integrating a semantic layer with Language Learning Models (LLMs) presents a clean solution to this, particularly in the realm of AI chatbots. This combination empowers businesses to generate fast res...
item.content:encoded: Integrating a semantic layer with Language Learning Models (LLMs) presents a clean solution to this, particularly in the realm of AI chatbots. This combination empowers businesses to generate fast responses and reports based on their data. Leveraging AI and semantic layers is advancing business intelligence, making it easier than ever for people to interact with data.

item.content:encoded: Posted by M√≥nica Ribero D√≠az, Research Scientist, Google Research Differential privacy (DP) is a property of randomized mechanisms that limit the influence of any individual user‚Äôs information while processing and analyzing data. DP offers a robust solution to address growing concerns about data protection, enabling technologies across industries and government applications (e.g., the US census) without compromising individual user identities. As its adoption increases, it‚Äôs important to id...
